name: Bright and Brutal - conquer concrete
description:
'Bright and Brutal' is a game made by three game design students as a 3rd semester project. We challenged ourselves to merge the real time strategy genre with a first person dungeon crawler.

As the player you are in charge of three drones (in red) to fight groups of enemy drones (in blue). Drones come in three types: ranged, melee and shield - they counter each other.
Clear the level from all enemy drones to win the game. If you lose all of your drones, take too much damage yourself or fall of the map you lose.
